headline: T-Mobile Reports Strong Earnings, but Its Wireless Results Disappoint. The Stock Is Sliding.
summary: T-Mobile added 1.34 million postpaid customers in the first quarter, exceeding Wall Street’s estimates.

headline: VZ Q1 Earnings Call: Verizon Highlights Customer Retention and Broadband Growth Amid Stable Results
summary: Telecommunications giant Verizon (NYSE:VZ) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 1.5% year on year to $33.49 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.19 per share was 3.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) Innovates Public Safety, Faces Legal Challenges With Antitrust Allegations
summary: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) launched the Verizon Frontline Network Slice and faced a legal action from VoIP-Pal in the last quarter, amidst a 9% increase in its share price. The introduction of a network slice dedicated to first responders underscored Verizon's commitment to enhancing its product offerings, potentially boosting investor confidence. However, the legal challenge may have posed concerns about potential financial risks. As markets rose around 6% over the past year, largely...

headline: Motorola razr reboot: Iconic style, moto ai smarts — and Verizon-exclusive savings
summary: Get a price-lock guarantee on any myPlan and get a motorola razr on us with any trade-in and myPlanNEW YORK, April 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- [The big news] The new motorola razr is coming to Verizon, and it’s smarter, sleeker and more iconic than ever. With moto ai built in, it does more of the thinking for you — organizing notes, creating playlists and helping you find info fast. Orders start May 15 in PANTONE Gibraltar Sea, PANTONE Spring Bud and PANTONE Parfait Pink — all for $16.67/month

headline: Verizon Frontline Network Slice launches coast-to-coast

headline: Relevant+ and Total Wireless Partner with Tigre Sounds to Launch "Beats Per Mile" -- A Latin DJ Coffee Club Experience During Miami Race Week
summary: Relevant+, the leading independent culture media group for U.S. Hispanic audiences, is teaming up its music discovery youth publisher Tigre Sounds in partnership with Total Wireless to launch Beats Per Mile (BPM), an exclusive DJ-driven electronic music experience set to ignite Miami Race Week.
